Title: Don't Threaten Me With a Good Time
Description:
Emberthal seems worried, but I'm sure she'll come back. And when she does, she'll pick a visage form!

Chromie told us all about the celebrations dragons used to have for Visage Day.

So, Kalecgos and I are going to blow stuff up! Fireworks, mostly.

We'll need some arcane residue to make them, though.

Conveniently, there are some arcane elementals just outside the Gardens of Unity that are ripe for the harvest.

The three of us have some other preparations to make here in Valdrakken.
ObjectivesText: Collect 100 Arcane Residue from Volatile Arcana in The Cascades.
